[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/inherit/terrain_map/distance_str.c

An inherit to use in the terrain stuff to deal with distance messages when they are needed.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Mon Apr 1 12:40:00 PST 2002

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/terrain_map.h

Method index

query_distance_str(int)
This method returns a string displaying how long the specified distance is.
query_distance_str_no_ones(int)
This method returns a string displaying how long the specified distance is, without any ones.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
query_distance_str

This method returns a string displaying how long the specified distance is.

Parameters:
dist - the distance

This method returns a string displaying how long the specified distance is, without any ones.
